00020 //
00021 // Note to the LRM writer : These interfaces are channel specific interfaces
00022 // useful in the context of tlm_fifo.
00023 //
00024 
00025 #ifndef __TLM_FIFO_IFS_H__
00026 #define __TLM_FIFO_IFS_H__
00027 
00028 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_req_rsp/tlm_1_interfaces/tlm_core_ifs.h"
00029 
00030 namespace tlm {
00031 
00032 //
00033 // Fifo specific interfaces
00034 //
00035 
00036 // Fifo Debug Interface
00037 
00038 template< typename T >
00039 class tlm_fifo_debug_if : public virtual sc_core::sc_interface
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   virtual int used() const = 0;
00043   virtual int size() const = 0;
00044   virtual void debug() const = 0;
00045 
00046   //
00047   // non blocking peek and poke - no notification
00048   //
00049   // n is index of data :
00050   // 0 <= n < size(), where 0 is most recently written, and size() - 1
00051   // is oldest ie the one about to be read.
00052   //
00053 
00054   virtual bool nb_peek( T & , int n ) const = 0;
00055   virtual bool nb_poke( const T & , int n = 0 ) = 0;
00056 
00057 };
00058 
00059 // fifo interfaces = extended + debug
00060 
00061 template < typename T >
00062 class tlm_fifo_put_if :
00063   public virtual tlm_put_if<T> ,
00064   public virtual tlm_fifo_debug_if<T> {};
00065 
00066 template < typename T >
00067 class tlm_fifo_get_if :
00068   public virtual tlm_get_peek_if<T> ,
00069   public virtual tlm_fifo_debug_if<T> {};
00070 
00071 class tlm_fifo_config_size_if : public virtual sc_core::sc_interface
00072 {
00073 public:
00074   virtual void nb_expand( unsigned int n = 1 ) = 0;
00075   virtual void nb_unbound( unsigned int n = 16 ) = 0;
00076 
00077   virtual bool nb_reduce( unsigned int n = 1 ) = 0;
00078   virtual bool nb_bound( unsigned int n ) = 0;
00079 
00080 };
00081 
00082 } // namespace tlm
00083 
00084 #endif
